desc: We supply Vintage Luggage, Antique Suitcases and Louis Vuitton trunks from Camden and Chiswick London we lovingly restore old suitcase to their former glory. Call us on 07850 936 469

layout.text: We stock vintage luggage and unique collectables. We sell and hire vintage items to private collectors and various industries around the world. We have earned a reputation for being a one-stop shop for antique items, vintage props, vintage luggage, sporting items and trunks. Our vast collection spans a wide range of eras and styles.
